comment: This was such an odd class to have experienced for the first time with Dr. Crovitz, but I think we all just did our best. Dr. Crovitz gave great feedback in a timely manner. I would recommend him for any class.

Best professor I've had at KSU. He wants to make sure you do well in the class so if you communicate with him you'll do great. The textbooks are important to the course but they are also just good materials to have.

100% the best professor Ive ever had. He will work with the class on anything, and all of his assignments make sense/ have a clear purpose. So many professors make their courses needlessly difficult by packing them full of needless fluff or by having needlessly vague criteria. Crovitz does neither of these things.

Dr. Crovitz is very passionate about his work, and cares very much about his students. He is willing to work around deadlines, and gives excellent feedback. He is more focused on what a student learns rather than the grades given, and gives lots of opportunity to rework assignments until a concept is understood. He is honestly my favorite professor

This man is a literal gem. Open & flexible with his students, makes sure you have all the time you need to turn in quality assignments. Makes class interesting. Fun assignments and discussions. SO CARING about his students. Wants you to succeed and is willing to help you do so. Highly recommend. I wish I had him again.

Professor Crovitz is amazing. He is extremely patient, flexible, and genuinely cares for his students and their success. He also assigns work that is actually interesting and challenges you to think. Not a bad word to say about Professor Crovitz!

This was Dr. Crovitz's first time teaching ENGL 2271 and he did an incredible job. He is the best professor I have ever had. He genuinely cares about his students and he is really good at explaining things. There are a lot of group discussions. He uses Google Drive which is awesome. I wish I could take him for all of my English classes.

Excellent professor. Students learn in his class to think outside the traditional realm. He appears to be laid back yet, he facilitates brilliant conversations. He is extremely helpful and will take the time necessary to make sure that the student gets what he/she needs to be successful. Rigorous schedule and high expectations. Be ready to stretch.
Crovitz is the best. For originality, creativity, and insight, he can't be topped. Great class discussions.

DC rocks!  He is approachable, knowledgeable, and easy on the eyes, too.  His classe are fun, interesting, encouraging, and enlightening.  He needs to go to the Education department and teach some of those professors a thing or two about relating to students.  DC, you rock!

Dr. Crovitz is one of the most memorable teachers I have ever had.  I took 3310 with him during the Summer and actually changed my major from middle grades ed to English ed due to DC and his awesome style and techniques he introduces.  Dr. Crovitz will touch your professional life in ways you never believed possible. Work smart and do the readings!

Crovitz is awesome.  If you you need or want to take Engl 3310, then you must sign for Dr. Crovitz's class. It will probably be the most memorable class you will ever take.  I know it was one of the few classes that I looked forward to going to everyday.
Best course I've ever had at KSU, perhaps anywhere. Very good teaching and the most useful of any courses so far.
